src:
Jadwal Timnas Indonesia U-22 di SEA Games 2019, Thailand Lawan Pertama
02 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-22 akan tampil di SEA Games 2019 yang digelar di Filipina mulai 25 November hingga 10 Desember 2019 mendatang. Berikut jadwal timnas Indonesia U-22 di SEA Games 2019 selengkapnya.
Pembagian grup cabor sepak bola SEA Games 2019 baru saja usai dirilis. Timnas Indonesia U-22 akan bergabung di Grup B bersama dengan Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Singapura dan juga Brunei Darussalam.
Timnas Indonesia U-22 sendiri memiliki jadwal yang cukup sulit di pertandingan pertamanya. Bagaimana tidak, tim asuhan Indra Sjafri tersebut harus sudah bertemu dengan tim kuat Thailand pada laga pertama penyisihan grup B, 26 November 2019, pukul 15:00 WIB.



Setelah menghadapi Thailand, tim asuhan Indra Sjafri kemudian ditunggu oleh Singapura. Pertandingan ini akan digela di Stadion Rizal Memorial pada 28 November 2019 mulai pukul 19:00 WIB.
Sementara itu di Grup A juga tak kalah sengit. Selain ditempati oleh tim tuan rumah Filipina, di sana juga bercokol Malaysia, Myanmar, Kamboja, dan Timor Leste. Pertandingan antara Malaysia vs Myanmar di Grup A sendiri akan menjadi laga pertama cabor sepak bola di SEA Games 2019 ini.
Berikut jadwal lengkap timnas Indonesia U-22 di SEA Games 2019.
text:
Indonesia U-22 national team schedule at the 2019 SEA Games, Thailand's First Opponent
02 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-22 national team will perform at the 2019 SEA Games held in the Philippines from November 25 to December 10 2019. The following is the schedule for the Indonesia U-22 national team at the 2019 SEA Games.
The division of the 2019 SEA Games soccer group has just been released. The Indonesia U-22 national team will join Group B along with Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Singapore and also Brunei Darussalam.
Indonesian U-22 national team itself has a pretty difficult schedule in its first match. How not, Indra Sjafri's team must have met with Thailand's strong team in the first match of group B qualifying, November 26, 2019, at 15:00 WIB.



After facing Thailand, Indra Sjafri's care team was then awaited by Singapore. This match will be played at the Rizal Memorial Stadium on November 28, 2019 starting at 19:00 WIB.
Meanwhile in Group A is no less fierce. Besides being occupied by the host team of the Philippines, there also entrenched Malaysia, Myanmar, Cambodia and Timor Leste. The match between Malaysia vs Myanmar in Group A itself will be the first football match at this 2019 SEA Games.
The following is the full schedule of the Indonesian U-22 national team at the 2019 SEA Games.
